[size=4]Dawn guard is necessary for this MOD.[/size]


Documents about vampire Lunasia.
[/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font][font=Times New Roman]Age Approximately 1,200 years old.[/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font][font=Times New Roman]she drink the blood of the domestic animal without sucking the blood of the person.[/font][font=Times New Roman]she fight against a vampire drinking human blood.[/font][font=Times New Roman]The existence that is rare among vampires.[/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font][font=Times New Roman]There is the past that wants to help a critically ill human being, and gave her blood.[/font][font=Times New Roman]The name of the person who helped is  cynthia.


She is good at chill magic.
[/font][font=Times New Roman]
[/font][font=Times New Roman]Blizzard.[/font][font=Times New Roman]
